name: YouChooseExtremeSports
0:
”Alexa, open Extreme Sports”
”Alexa, play Extreme Sports”
”Alexa, open Extreme Sports and go to the Stories Menu”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: extreme sports
Developer Terms of Use
des: YOU CHOOSE: EXTREME SPORTS, is a You Choose bundle from Capstone, powered by Earplay. This bundle features four action-packed, interactive stories, including Surviving the Le Mans Auto Race, Surviving Mount Everest, Surviving the Iditarod, and Surviving Marathon des Sables. With simple voice commands, you get to make life-and-death decisions in competitions where one false move could prove fatal and one great choice could garner glory. With multiple endings, this You Choose bundle is a truly dynamic experience. The first story, Surviving the Le Mans Auto Race is available to all users with the additional stories available with purchase or Kids+ subscription.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
